column3: I never thought of forging anything metallic for the Zun. They always seemed like a “bone and hide” kind of people...
I'd almost forgotten what it was like to feel the weight of coins in my pocket...
With Iola on one side, and Colana on the other, I'm feeling a bit squeezed in the middle. If only Rend were here, he'd gladly take some of the heat.
Even with Rend back, I'm still getting the heavy end of the hammer. Aye, it was a faint hope at best...
You're an inspiration, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. I may not have your imagination, but I'm willing to give this new merchandise thing a damn good try!
Right, something new, something new... I'm drawing a complete blank.
